\item Relevant Coursework: \footnotesize{Advanced Deep Learning, Operating Systems, Knowledge Discovery from Data}

ExperienceTasks: Implemented authentication and authorization using Azure Active Directory and Azure App Service.
Implemented continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline using GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement Agile development methodologies and iterative delivery.
Designed and implemented a data visualization dashboard using Power BI to improve reporting efficiency.

ProjectAchievements: Used open API OpenWeatherMap to gather forecasted data on weather patterns based on users' geographic location.
Implemented UI app to serve the forecasted weather data, with visualizations on compatible web hosted app.
Past weather queries are stored in AWS RDS cloud to query against for history view.
Developed a Sewing Almanac for avid sewists in the San Luis Obispo country area.
Completed with a social media forum for sharing results and tips on garment items.
Users can trade garment cards through a central admin database.
Wrote a simple memory allocator in C, and adjusted allocated memory to align to a page boundary.
Wrote a simplistic Unix shell in C.
